TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ProfileGroupBase extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供对分组的 ASP.NET 配置文件属性值的非类型化访问。

span.span: Provides untyped access to grouped ASP.NET profile property values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 使用 类在当前的属性中创建分组属性。 The class is used by ASP.NET to create grouped properties in the property for the current . 如果将属性指定为一组属性[(ASP.NET 设置架构的属性) 的组元素](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b4e3672f-9653-4034-a178-fb358b02730e), 则 ASP.NET 将使用强类型访问器为组中的每个属性创建一个新类。When properties are specified as a group of properties using the [group Element for properties for profile (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b4e3672f-9653-4034-a178-fb358b02730e), ASP.NET creates a new class with strongly typed accessors for each property in the group. 新类继承基类。The new class inherits the base class. 新类的强类型访问器分别调用 基类的和方法来检索和设置配置文件属性值。The strongly typed accessors of the new class call the and methods of the base class to retrieve and set profile property values, respectively. 传递调用以获取属性值并将其设置为类, 该类继承提供给类的方法的类。 The passes calls to get and set property values to the class that inherits the class that is supplied to the method of the class. 有关行为、异常等的详细信息, 请参阅类。See the class for more information on behaviors, exceptions, and so on. 此类不应从你的代码创建。This class is not intended to be created from your code. ## Examples 下面的 web.config 文件指定了一个用户配置文件, 其中包含组名为的`Address`一组属性。The following Web.config file specifies a user profile that contains a group of properties with a group name of `Address`. 为 `Profile.Address.Street`当前的属性生成的分组属性将以组名称开头, 例如。The grouped properties generated for the property of the current will be preceded by the group name, for example, `Profile.Address.Street`. 第二个示例显示了存储和检索配置的配置文件属性的 ASP.NET 页。The second example shows an ASP.NET page that stores and retrieves the configured profile properties. ```xml ``` 下面的代码示例演示一个 ASP.NET 页, 该页读取和设置为用户配置文件指定的分组属性。The following code example shows an ASP.NET page that reads and sets the grouped properties specified for the user profile. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个文本框, 该文本框接受用户输入, 这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Profile.HttpProfileGroupBase#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.HttpProfileGroupBase/CS/defaultcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Profile.HttpProfileGroupBase#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.HttpProfileGroupBase/VB/defaultvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 使用类在当前的属性中创建分组属性。ASP.NET uses the class to create grouped properties in the property for the current . 如果将属性指定为一组属性[(ASP.NET 设置架构的属性) 的组元素](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b4e3672f-9653-4034-a178-fb358b02730e), 则 ASP.NET 将使用强类型访问器为组中的每个属性创建一个新类。When properties are specified as a group of properties using the [group Element for properties for profile (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b4e3672f-9653-4034-a178-fb358b02730e) element, ASP.NET creates a new class with strongly typed accessors for each property in the group. 新类继承基类。The new class inherits the base class. 此类不应从你的代码创建。This class is not intended to be created from your code. ## Examples 下面的 web.config 文件指定了一个用户配置文件, 其中包含组名为的`Address`一组属性。The following Web.config file specifies a user profile that contains a group of properties with a group name of `Address`. 为 `Profile.Address.Street`当前的属性生成的分组属性将以组名称开头, 例如。The grouped properties generated for the property of the current will be preceded by the group name, for example, `Profile.Address.Street`. ``` ``` 以下 ASP.NET 页读取和设置为用户配置文件指定的分组属性。The following ASP.NET page reads and sets the grouped properties specified for the user profile. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个文本框, 该文本框接受用户输入, 这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). member this.GetPropertyValue : string -> obj

param.name: propertyName
param.span: 分组配置文件属性的名称。

span.span: The name of the grouped profile property.

summary.span: 获取分组配置文件属性的值。

returns.span: 类型化为 的分组配置文件属性的值。

span.span: The value of the grouped profile property typed as .

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 使用类为用户配置文件创建类。ASP.NET uses the class to create the class for the user profile. 当已启用用户配置文件的应用程序启动时, ASP.NET 将创建一个类型`ProfileCommon`为的新类, 该类继承自类。When an application that has the user profile enabled is started, ASP.NET creates a new class of type `ProfileCommon`, which inherits from the class. 强类型访问器将添加到`ProfileCommon` [配置文件元素 (ASP.NET 设置架构)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ccb9bf3a-a044-464d-b89b-5cb5a3d389dd)配置节中定义的每个组和属性的类。Strongly typed accessors are added to the `ProfileCommon` class for each group and property defined in the [profile Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ccb9bf3a-a044-464d-b89b-5cb5a3d389dd) configuration section. `ProfileCommon`类的强类型化访问器调用方法, 以从生成的访问器中检索非类型化的值, 然后将其转换为指定的类型, 并将作为分组属性值返回。The strongly typed accessors of the `ProfileCommon` class call the method to retrieve untyped values from the that the generated accessor then casts as the specified type and returns as the grouped property value. 可以使用方法按名称检索应用程序的用户配置文件的分组属性值。You can use the method to retrieve grouped property values of the user profile for your application by name. 返回的值的类型`object`为, 并且在检索时必须强制转换为特定的对象类型。Returned values are typed as `object` and must be cast as the specific object type when retrieved. 对于对配置文件属性值的强类型访问, 你可以按名称将分组属性作为属性组的成员进行访问, `Profile.Address.City`例如。For strongly typed access to profile property values, you can access the grouped property by name as a member of a group of the property, for example, `Profile.Address.City`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示一个 ASP.NET 页, 该页读取和设置为用户配置文件指定的分组属性。The following code example shows an ASP.NET page that reads and sets the grouped properties specified for the user profile. 有关为用户配置文件指定分组属性的 web.config 文件的示例, 请参阅为类提供的示例。For an example of a Web.config file that specifies grouped properties for the user profile, see the example provided for the class. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个文本框, 该文本框接受用户输入, 这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Profile.HttpProfileGroupBase#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.HttpProfileGroupBase/CS/defaultcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Profile.HttpProfileGroupBase#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.HttpProfileGroupBase/VB/defaultvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用此属性来检索或设置应用程序的用户配置文件的分组属性值。You can use this property to retrieve or set grouped property values of the user profile for your application. 返回的值的类型为, 并且在检索时必须强制转换为特定的对象类型。Returned values are typed as and must be cast as the specific object type when retrieved. 对于对配置文件属性值的强类型访问, 你可以按名称作为属性组的成员访问属性, `Profile.Address.City`例如。For strongly typed access to profile property values, you can access the property by name as a member of a group of the property, for example, `Profile.Address.City`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示一个 ASP.NET 页, 该页读取和设置为用户配置文件指定的分组属性。The following code example shows an ASP.NET page that reads and sets the grouped properties specified for the user profile. 有关在配置文件中指定一组属性的 web.config 文件的示例, 请参阅为类提供的示例。For an example of a Web.config file that specifies a group of properties in the profile, see the example provided for the class. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个文本框, 该文本框接受用户输入, 这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Profile.HttpProfileGroupBase#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.HttpProfileGroupBase/CS/defaultcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Profile.HttpProfileGroupBase#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.HttpProfileGroupBase/VB/defaultvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: Sets the value of a grouped profile property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 使用类创建用于用户配置文件的类。ASP.NET uses the class to create the class used for the user profile. 当已启用用户配置文件的应用程序启动时, ASP.NET 将创建一个类型`ProfileCommon`为的新类, 该类继承自类。When an application that has the user profile enabled is started, ASP.NET creates a new class of type `ProfileCommon`, which inherits from the class. 强类型访问器将添加到`ProfileCommon` [配置文件元素 (ASP.NET 设置架构)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ccb9bf3a-a044-464d-b89b-5cb5a3d389dd)配置节中定义的每个组和属性的类。Strongly typed accessors are added to the `ProfileCommon` class for each group and property defined in the [profile Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ccb9bf3a-a044-464d-b89b-5cb5a3d389dd) configuration section. `ProfileCommon`类的强类型访问器调用方法, 以将分组属性值传递到, 以存储在数据源。The strongly typed accessors of the `ProfileCommon` class call the method to pass grouped property values to the to be stored at the data source. 您可以使用方法为您的应用程序按名称将值分配给用户配置文件的已分组属性。You can use the method to assign values to grouped properties of the user profile for your application by name. 值的类型为`object,` , 类型检查将在运行时 (而非编译时) 完成。Values are typed as `object,` and type checking will be done at run time, not compile time. 对于对配置文件属性值的强类型访问, 你可以按名称将分组属性作为属性组的成员进行访问, `Profile.Address.City`例如。For strongly typed access to profile property values, you can access the grouped property by name as a member of a group of the property, for example, `Profile.Address.City`. ## Examples 以下 ASP.NET 页读取和设置为用户配置文件指定的分组属性。The following ASP.NET page reads and sets the grouped properties specified for the user profile. 有关为用户配置文件指定分组属性的 web.config 文件的示例, 请参阅为类提供的示例。For an example of a Web.config file that specifies grouped properties for the user profile, see the example provided for the class. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个文本框, 该文本框接受用户输入, 这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).
